title: Amalgamated Codazzi Raychaudhuri identity for foliation
abstract: It is shown how a pure background tensor formalism provides a concise but explicit and highly flexible machinery for the generalised curvature analysis of individual embedded surfaces and foliations such as arise in the theory of topological defects in cosmological and other physical contexts. The unified treatment provided here shows how the relevant extension of the Raychaudhuri identity is related to the correspondingly extended Codazzi identity.
